TopicTitle: Looking for more varied 3+ kerbal command pods and rover related mods

Articles.Content:
Using KSP 0.90 here.

Anyways, I'm just wondering what good mods have more varied 3+ kerbal command pods and some other rover related stuff because there isn't really a good way to make a rover without the rovemate structural body, IMO, or maybe I just need ideas. B9 does have a few 3 and 4 kerbal pods, but they're more in the spaceplane/shuttle style.

Current mods that I have:

Better Buoyancy

FAR

KAS

MechJeb plus extension for FAR

Nereids S.A.V.E. backup system

Hangar mod 2.0.2.2

B9 Aerospace

Stock Part Revamp (textures only)

ATM

Stock Bug Fix Modules

procedural fairings

Edited January 14, 2015 by smjjames

The American Pack has a 6 kerbal pod and 2 kerbal rover http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/81754-Release-BobCat-Ind-Space-Planet-products And rover parts here some from ASET http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/86343-New-project-from-ASET and http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/94947-Exploration-Rover-System-by-A-S-E-T-%2810-10-14%29
The USI Exploration Pack has some great modular rover parts, and Taurus HCV includes a 7-Kerbal 3.75m command pod, and also 3.75m 8-passenger pod and science lab.

Near Future (Spacecraft) has a command pod that can hold 6 Kerbals.

I like it very much.
